data.title: Tribute Bands — WCTA
data.text:
Tribute Bands

With one of the largest rosters of entertainers on the West Coast, our entertainers specialize in festivities regardless of category, genre, or style.

West Coast Talent Agency is proud to have booked several nationally and internationally celebrated artists for our events. These talented acts have been accredited with various awards and recognitions. Have a look at the national talent we have booked — you’ll be sure to know some of these famous musicians!

AC/DC

Hailing from Sydney, Australia, AC/DC is now recognized as pioneers of hard rock and heavy metal music after they captured the hearts of people across the globe with their theatrical high-energy shows.

The Tribute BANDs FOR AC/DC

Whole Lotta Rosies

Whole Lotta Rosies is LA’s top all girl, AC/DC tribute band. They not only perform across the country, but also have performed for our U.S. Troops all over the world, including Bosnia, Sarajevo, Kosovo, Germany, Europe, and South Korea.

See Video >

Noise Pollution

Some things in life just keep giving year after year. In the rock n’ roll world, it is the music of AC/DC. Based in San Diego, Noise Pollution delivers an amazing replication of the AC/DC concert experience from both the Bon Scott and Brian Johnson periods. Noise Pollution has performed for hundreds of thousands of AC/DC fans over the past 5 years. The band is professional in their respect for the music and their performance. CBS Los Angeles has declared Noise Pollution “one of the best you’ll find.”

See Video >

Appetite For Destruction

Welcome to the jungle Guns N' Roses fans! Appetite 4 Destruction is a hard working, professional rock band that delivers the same “rude & crude” presentation that you would normally find at a Guns N' Roses concert. Nevertheless their long-standing reputation at numerous State Fairs and family events is exceptional. So depending on the situation, they are able to modify the performance to accommodate an “all ages” show.

See Video >

Herway to Hell

Herway to Hell is the All-Female AC/DC. Too punk for Rock, too Rock for Punk! Herway to Hell come together to pay tribute to both the Bon Scott and Brian Johnson eras. These 5 talented women hail from Los Angeles, California. They are beautifully ferocious musicians, dedicated to remaining true to the powerful electric guitar driven sound and raw high energy performances of early AC/DC.

See Video >

Aerosmith

One of the most popular hard rock bands of the '70s, Aerosmith set the style and sound of hard rock and heavy metal.

The Tribute BANDS FOR AEROSMITH

Aeromyth

Aeromyth has become known as the top Aerosmith Tribute band worldwide! Chris Vandahl does an amazing portrayal of Steven Tyler, including all of his dance moves, costumes, stage show and amazing recreation of Tyler's outrageous vocals.

See Video >

Bad Company

Bad Company are an English rock supergroup that was formed in 1973

The Tribute BANDS FOR bad company

RAD CO.

RadCo has been performing the heart and soul of Bad Company songs for over 8 years from intimate club dates to large outdoor festivals. These seasoned players really capture the essence of Bad Company. With melodic vocals and a big overall sound...makes you feel that you are actually experiencing the real deal. This is a “Must See” show.

See Video >

Good Company

Calling on all classic blues/rock fans! The British are coming! Come see “Good Company”, the Worlds #1 Premiere tribute to the legendary Paul “The Voice” Rodgers of Bad Company, Free, The Firm, and Queen perform their 60 minute power packed show featuring all the greatest hits from Paul Rodgers of “Bad Company”s extraordinary career from the early 1970s to current modern day. Since 2018, Tribute band, “Good Company” has wowed and amazed large audiences all over Southern California and abroad with their authentic and detailed renditions of songs such as “Alright Now”, “Feel Like Makin Love”, “Shooting Star”, Can’t Get Enough”, and “Bad Company” just to name a few.

See Video >

The Beach Boys

The Beach Boys are a rock group whose uplifting melodies and vocal harmonies captured idyllic life in sun-drenched southern California during the 1960s.

The Tribute BANDS FOR The Beach Boys

CATCH A WAVE

Right down to the same instruments, amplifiers and precise slurs, slides and vocal mannerisms that gave the legendary Beach Boys their signature sound, CATCH A WAVE captures it all. Enjoy the Beach Boys classics with an additional classic rock repertoire that Disney Entertainment regards as a spot on recreation of the music of the 1960's Beach Boys.

See Video >

Surf City Allstars

The Surf City Allstars are the only band in the world to have played and sang lead vocals in both the Beach Boys band and the Jan & Dean band. Why hire a lesser tribute band when you can pay about the same price for the best singers from the Beach Boys?

See Video >

Beastie Boys

Beastie Boys were an American hip-hop group. They were largely responsible for the growth of rap's mainstream audience.

The Tribute BANDS FOR The Beastie Boys

Pollywog Crew

Pollywog Crew is LA's one and only Beastie Boys tribute group comprised of three emcee's and one DJ.

See Video >

The Beatles

The Beatles were an English rock-pop band, and is regarded by many people to be the most successful and influential band in the history of popular music.

The Tribute BANDs FOR The Beatles

Paperback Writer

Paperback Writer - The Beatles Experience takes its audience on a trip through the musical years of the world’s most popular rock group of all time! Hear the hits of the Beatles performed with spot on vocals, looks, and sound.

See Video >

The Bee Gees

The Bee Gees were an English-Australian pop-rock band that symbolized the disco era of the late 1970s with hits like Stayin’ Alive, How Deep is Your Love, and Night Fever!

The Tribute BANDS FOR The Bee gees

Stayin Alive

Stayin Alive is the worlds #1 tribute to the Bee Gee's. Tony Mattina captures not only Barry Gibb’s vocal styling and tone, but also his looks and mannerisms that allow you to take a little glimpse back into the past.

See Video >

Billy Idol

Billy Idol, one of the world's most recognizable rock stars, achieved fame in the 1970s with the British punk rock band, Generation X and became the face of the rebellious rock-n-roll and punk scene in America with his solo career.

The Tribute BANDs FOR Billy Idol

IDOL X

Based in Los Angeles, California, IDOL X, the Billy Idol Live Experience, is the #1 tribute to Billy Idol. IDOL X combines a mix of Billy Idol and Generation X music, and puts on a high energy professional level tribute show that has people wanting more, more, more!

See Video >

Billy Joel

Billy Joel, is an American singer, pianist, composer and songwriter. Commonly nicknamed the "Piano Man" after his single and signature song of the same name.

The Tribute BANDs FOR Billy joel

Shade Of Billy

Steve Feller began singing and playing the piano at the age of five. Always the show man, he entertained his parents guests at dinner parties with his strong vocals and later went on to perform and win on the Ted Mack Amateur Hour three times. Throughout all fazes of his musical career, Steve has steadily performed Billy Joel’s songs as they hit the charts and is now showing tribute to his most revered iconic entertainer, Billy Joel, in his performance of “Shades of Billy” The Music of Billy Joel.

See Video >

Black Eyed Peas

Black Eyed Peas is an American musical group consisting of rappers will.i.am, apl.de.ap and Taboo.

The Tribute BANDs FOR BLACK EYED PEAS

Black Eyed Tease

Based out of Las Vegas, this high-energy group pays tribute to one of America’s favorite hip hop groups - the “Black Eyed Peas” - one of the most successful pop groups of our time. Covering all of the “Black Eyed Peas” multi-platinum and chart topping hits, The Black Eyed Tease gets the audience out of their seats and onto the dance floor!

See Video >

Bob Seger

Bob Seger and the Silver Bullet Band truly provided the soundtrack to a generation, especially those growing up in the Mid-West.

The Tribute BANDS FOR Bob Seger

Turn the Page

The members of Turn the Page had astounded audiences for their uncanny resemblance to the sound of Bob Seger, and thus Turn the Page was born. The band continues to pay tribute to Bob Seger and share their love for music.

See Video >

The Bob Seger Silver Tribute Band

The Bob Seger Silver Tribute Band is a 6 piece band based in Southern California whose performances capture the sound and pure rock & roll spirit that can only be found at a Bob Seger concert, including classics like Night Moves, Turn The Page, and Old Time Rock n Roll.

See Video >

Bon Jovi

Jon Bon Jovi is an American singer, songwriter, guitarist, and actor. He is best known as the founder and frontman of the rock band Bon Jovi, which was formed in 1983. He has released 15 studio albums with his band as well as two solo albums.

The Tribute BANDS FOR Bon Jovi

WANTED

WANTED is the nation’s number one tribute band performing the music of BON JOVI. Based out of Los Angeles, CA, WANTED is an incredible concert experience that captures the atmosphere, excitement, and fun of the arena rock anthems that can only be described as BON JOVI. Consisting of some of the LA music scene’s top musicians, WANTED re-creates the music of BON JOVI with the same energy, professionalism and spectacle as a real BON JOVI show. Come see what critics and audiences have been raving about.

See Video >

Boston

Boston is an American rock band from namesake Boston, Massachusetts, that had its most commercial successes during the 1970s and '80s.

The Tribute BANDs FOR Boston

Rock n Roll Band

A tribute to the music of Boston is not easily accomplished. Close enough doesn't cut it. The goal of Rock N Roll Band is to be good enough to play for the man himself, and the legion of fans who expect nothing less than top notch sound and performance.

Rock N Roll Band was formed with all this in mind: the music, the show, the legacy, and the respect for Tom Scholz, Brad Delp and the many fine musicians who have graced the stage to support them.

See Video >

Brooks and Dunn

Brooks & Dunn are an American country music duo consisting of Kix Brooks and Ronnie Dunn, both of whom are vocalists and songwriters.

The Tribute BANDs FOR brooks and dunn

Neon Circus

Performing internationally, Neon Circus consistently delivers a nonstop 90 minute show, providing engaging entertainment in the tradition of country music's very best. Neon Circus’ sound and look so close to the real thing that concert goers will believe they are actually experiencing a Brooks & Dunn live show.

See Video >

Bruce Springsteen

Bruce Springsteen is one of the most prolific song writers and storytellers of our time.

The Tribute BANDS FOR Bruce Springsteen

The Springsteen Experience

The Springsteen Experience is a high-octane, chronological journey, recreating the most memorable moments and stage interactions throughout Springsteen’s history. From 1973 through the height of Bruce’s Fame in the 80’s and beyond, this theatrical production accurately replicates the near circus-like appeal of an authentic Springsteen concert; including vintage equipment and stage sets, multiple costume changes, and note-perfect renditions of Bruce’s most popular hits and lyrical gems.

See Video >

Bruno Mars

Bruno Mars is known for his unforgettable, genre-blending, and upbeat tunes that retain a retro quality and style.

The Tribute BANDs FOR bruno mars

24K Magic

24k Magic is guaranteed to keep you on your feet with some of Bruno’s hottest hits from “Runaway Baby” all the way to “Leave the Door Open” and many more!

This tribute is like no other with lead singer Evan Saucedo taking the stage as Bruno Mars, and fellow band members Julian Davis (Horns and Rapper), Pedro Talarico (Guitar), Tommy Gruber (Bass) and Danny Alfaro (Drummer) taking the show to new heights with the accuracy in the band's performance and flashy fashions.

See Video >

Bryan Adams

Bryan Adams is a Canadian musician, singer, songwriter, record producer, and photographer.

The Tribute BANDs FOR BRYAN ADAMS

Reckless Summer

Reckless Summer is a Phoenix, AZ based Tribute Band to the music of Bryan Adams. Bryan Adams career spans over 40 years with his greatest success happening during the 80s and 90's with the albums Cuts Like A Knife(1983) and Reckless(1984) each reaching multi-Platinum status and multiple hit songs such as Cuts Like A Knife, This Time, Straight From The Heart, Run To You, It's Only Love and his biggest hits Summer of '69, Heaven and Everything I Do (I Do It For You) to name just a few. Reckless Summer recreates the music of Bryan Adams with stunning accuracy bringing a full two sets of Bryan Adams' greatest hits along with a few deeper cuts from his catalogue that will keep the audience entertained and singing/dancing the whole night. Reckless Summer consists of seasoned musicians each bringing a collective wealth of musicianship and professionalism that will not disappoint!

See Video >

The Cars

The Cars were an American rock band that emulated new wave energy with tight rhythms and disembodied vocals.

The Tribute BANDS FOR the cars

Candy-o

Covering all of The Cars radio hits as well as some popular album cuts, Candy-O captures the terminal cool of The Cars' live performance in all aspects. Bringing back the sound and total vibe of the 80's, the band consistently amazes and entertains crowds whenever and wherever they hit the stage.

See Video >

Creed

Creed is an American rock band prominent in the post-grunge movement of the late 1990’s

The Tribute BANDS FOR Creed

HIGHER

HIGHER embodies the look, sound, and emotions of your favorite iconic band, CREED

See Video >

Creedence Clearwater Revival

Creedence Clearwater Revival, also referred to as Creedence and CCR, was an American rock band formed in El Cerrito, California.

The Tribute BANDS FOR Creedence Clearwater Revival

Rad Moon Rising

Rad Moon Rising is Southern California's Premier Creedence Clearwater Revival Tribute Band. Bringing you the best of CCR and John Fogerty hits with the excitement and passion of those "swampy " Rock & Roll days, Rad Moon Rising will "Keep on Chooglin" your event as never before! Rad Moon Rising has been performing the sight and sounds of Creedence Clearwater Revival for over 10 years. Their mission is to satisfy the thirst for the basic Rock & Roll needs that can't be filled by today's current music.

See Video >

The Cult

The Cult is one of England’s leading metal revivalists, and is responsible for hits like She Sells Sanctuary, Love Removal Machine, and Fire Woman.

The Tribute BANDS FOR The Cult

Sonic Temple

Sonic Temple is a top flight Tribute Band to THE CULT originating out of Hollywood, Los Angeles. The band has worked hard to capture the elusive chutzpah of one of the world's top rock bands of the nineties.

See Video >

Dave Matthews Band

Dave Matthews Band is an American rock band. The band is known for playing songs differently in each performance; this practice has become a staple of their live shows.

The Tribute BANDs FOR DaVE MATTHEWS Band

Fake Matthews

FMB celebrates the Dave Matthews Band's energetic blend of rock, funk, jam and world music.

See Video >

David Bowie

From space-aged rock idol, to polished mainstream media star David Bowie changed the face of pop culture and music.

The Tribute BANDs FOR David Bowie

David Brighton’s Space Oddity

Space Oddity – The Ultimate David Bowie Experience is a live, multi-media spectacle that takes you on a musical journey through the constantly metamorphosing career of Rock and Roll’s most celebrated innovator. David Brighton is credited as being the world's best David Bowie impersonator, with one of the most entertaining tribute acts ever to hit the stage.

See Video >

Depeche Mode

Depeche Mode are an English electronic band formed in Basildon in 1980.

The Tribute BANDs FOR DEPECHE MODE

DEVOTIONAL - The Ultimate Depeche Mode Tribute

This band is led by Devotional Dave who was the former front man of Strangelove. They do good job of also capturing DM's essence

See Video >

Def Leppard

Def Leppard is an English rock band that was contributed heavily to the New Wave of British Heavy Metal.

The Tribute BANDS FOR Def Leppard

PYROMANIA

Nineteen years in the making, Def Leppard captures the music and the essence of a rock band that has sold over 100 million albums worldwide. Grabbing the bull by the horns, they have stunned audiences all over the world with their amazing recreation of one of the most memorable rock bands and rock songs ever written, with the music, the vocals, the harmonies and the screams.

See Video >

Pyrosteria

Pyrosteria is a recreation of the Def Leppard era with a tour through the hit albums Pyromania and Hysteria, with a few early gems and a few newer hits. Pyrosteria has the looks and sounds that made Def Leppard a worldwide success.

See Video >

Armageddon

Armageddon provides a genuine concert experience, performing all of the hits that made the iconic band what they are today. From the visual stage show, t the accurate musicianship, Armageddon will leave you wanting more!

See Video >

Donna Summer

Donna Summer was an American singer and songwriter. She gained prominence during the disco era of the 1970s and became known as the "Queen of Disco".

The Tribute BANDS FOR DONNA SUMMER

Endless Summer

We are Endless Summer! Celebrating the legacy of Donna Summer, the Queen of Disco and friends. We play all of Donna Summer’s top hits, including: well known disco anthems from Gloria Raynor, Thelma Houston, KC & the Sunshine Band and more! We provide a full 6-10 piece band which may include horns and percussion with multiple costume changes in between sets.

See Video >

The Doors

The Doors were an American rock band that gained notoriety for their dark poetry, theatrical innovations, and the shamanic presence of their lead singer, Jim Morrison.

The Tribute BANDS FOR The doors

Peace Frog

Peace Frog is a highly acclaimed act that pays tribute to Jim Morrison and The Doors by recreating the magic and intensity of a Doors concert experience. Dark and spooky, mystical and hypnotic, the band demonstrates the ability to transform any room into an actual Doors concert experience.

See Video >

The Eagles

The Eagles cultivated country rock into the mainstream, ingraining them into Classic Rock history with their timeless musicianship and lyrical arrangements.

The Tribute BANDs FOR the eagles

Desperado

Desperado has become one of the best and most well known Eagles tributes in the United States. They boast a line-up of five lead singers and multi-instrumentalists; which not only possess and rivals the musical talents of the actual Eagles, but have been used to play with members of the Hall of Fame band itself.

See Video >

The Long Run

Experience The Eagles is a superb tribute show based in Los Angeles dedicated to respectfully performing the timeless music of the Eagles for audiences all over the world. The Long Run is a hard-working, Los Angeles-based tribute show dedicated to a single objective: "We strive to deliver the finest, live Eagles concert experience next to the Eagles themselves."

See Video >

The Eagles Ronstadt Experience

The Eagles Ronstadt Experience is a band of accomplished musicians dedicated to bringing to audiences an exciting concert experience of the two most iconic and popular artists of Rock: Linda Ronstadt & The Eagles. With a repertoire of chart topping hits, ERE has outstanding lead and harmony vocalists, a poppin’ rhythm section, soaring and soulful guitar solos, and a warm and welcoming stage persona.

See Video >

Boys of Summer

All the way from Los Angeles, these boys have been playing throughout the country since 2004 and will have the most elitist Eagles fans shouting for more as they re-create some of the best songs ever written in rock n roll history.

This show is a must see for all Eagles fans! All the greatest hits like One Of These Nights, Witchy Woman, Best Of My Love, Take It To The Limit, Life In The Fastlane, Hotel California, Desperado, Take It Easy, Peaceful Easy Feeling, Tequila Sunrise, New Kid In Town, Already Gone, Victim Of Love plus so many deep cuts from the 70s

Elton John

Singer, pianist, and composer, Elton John is one of the best-selling artists of all time.

The Tribute BANDs FOR Elton John

Rocket Men

Rocket Men collectively create the signature sounds of the great Elton John, and offer something truly unique for their fans. With their live musical experience, they bring a 100% live reproduction of all the Elton songs you know and love.

See Video >

Fleetwood Mac

Since their inception in the late ‘60s, Fleetwood Mac has grown into one of the most influential rock groups in music.

The Tribute BANDS FOR Fleetwood Mac

Gypsy Dreams

Gypsy Dreams combines seasoned touring musicians dedicated to providing a re-creation of the magic that is Fleetwood Mac with perfectly blended harmonies. Gypsy Dreams is a spin-off from the popular and well-respected Los Angeles based band Gypsy with Stevie Nicks vocalist Lisa McCormick, who engages her audience with energy and pitch perfect vocals.

See Video >

Foreigner

Foreigner is one of the most successful bands of our time, led by Mick Jones of the Songwriters Hall of Fame.

The Tribute BANDs FOR Foreigner

Urgent LA

Urgent-LA faithfully recreates every nuance of the classic Foreigner hits that you have come to know and Love so well over the years. This high-powered 6 piece band showcases over 40 years of combined experience touring, recording, and entertaining crowds.

See Video >

Eric Clapton

Eric Clapton is a British rock and blues guitarist, singer, and songwriter who is recognized as one of the most influential guitarists of all time.

The Tribute BANDs FOR Eric Clapton

Clapton Road

Clapton Road covers 50 years of chart topping Rock, Blues, Reggae and Ballad hits that were performed by Eric Clapton over his long career! This highly talented and professional 7 piece band provides a wide variety of musical styles to bring you the ultimate entertainment experience!

See Video >

Frankie Valli & the Four Seasons

In 1990, Frankie Valli & the Four Seasons were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, and to this day their unique and irresistible music continues to thrill all ages.

The Tribute BANDS FOR Frankie Valli & the Four Seasons

Oh What A Night!

Oh What A Night! is an exciting musical revue written by Motown producer and creative consultant George Soloman, directed by award-winning producer-director Michael Chapman with choreography by Paul Holmquist.

Sherry, Big Girls Don't Cry, Walk Like A Man, Can't Take My Eyes Off You, My Eyes Adored You, Working My Way Back To You, Let's Hang On and Who Loves You are just some of the many hits you'll enjoy from the dynamic songbook of those boys from Jersey.

See Video >

Genesis

Genesis are an English rock band, and were among the pioneers of progressive rock.

The Tribute BANDS FOR GenesiS

One More Night

Since their humble beginnings in 2017 in Phoenix, Arizona, "One More Night - The Phil Collins / Genesis Experience" has been on an incredible musical journey, and they are very excited to share it with you.

They've had the privilege to perform at various venues, including Casinos, Performing Arts Theaters, and even some lively festivals. From the West Coast's California to the East Coast's New York, from the Northern charm of Washington State to the sunny embrace of Florida, and even crossing borders to Canada, the band has been fortunate to take the music of Phil Collins on the road and connect with audiences like you.

See Video >

George Michael

George Michael was an English singer, songwriter and record producer. He is considered one of the most significant cultural icons of the MTV generation.

The Tribute BANDS FOR George Michael

George Michael Reborn

This show is a must see! With his live vocals (NO LIP-SYNCING here), Robert Bartko exudes the energy and passion of George in the 80’s and 90’s… getting the crowd on the dance floor for “Wake Me Up Before You Go-Go” and prompting standing ovations for his performance of “Careless Whisper.” Robert is a spot-on George Michael lookalike, with the vocal range, dance moves, crowd interaction, and charisma that will leave you cheering for an encore. Close your eyes and you’ll swear you’re listening to the real deal.

See Video >

The Go-Go’s

The Go-Go's are an American rock band formed in Los Angeles, California, in 1978. They are widely considered the most successful all-female rock band of all time.

The Tribute BANDS FOR The Go-Go’s

Totally Go-Go's

Based in the LA region of southern California, Totally Go-Go's is the only all-female tribute to the Go-Go's anywhere! Totally Go-Go's pays homage to the Go-Go’s legacy as the first all-girl band to top the Billboard charts. Totally Go-Go's captures the essence of the exuberance and worry free decade of the 80's.

See Video >

Green Day

Green Day is an American punk rock band that captured the rebellious streak of American teenagers with their lyrics and melodic pop sensibility.

The Tribute BANDS FOR Green Day

GREEN TODAY

GREEN TODAY, A Tribute to Green Day, was founded on three basic ideas: The need to rock, our love for Green Day, and most importantly, so many others love of Green Day too! With this in mind, GREEN TODAY has created a high energy live Green Day Tribute show with the songs, look, harmonies, and hooks that Green Day fans deserve.

See Video >

Guns N' Roses

Guns N' Roses is an American hard rock band from Los Angeles, California, formed in 1985. The early music of Guns N' Roses was a fusion of punk rock, blues rock, hard rock, heavy metal and hair metal.

The Tribute BANDS FOR Guns N' Roses

Lose Your Illusion

Come aboard and ride the "Nightrain" with the most authentic Guns N' Roses tribute band, that will take you on a ride that encompasses GN'R's entire career ('85-present day); that's sure to satisfy everybody's "Appetite for Destruction". With the amazing stage show based on the "Not In This Lifetime Tour", it's no wonder why "Lose Your Illusion" is turning heads all over. If what you seek is an amazing Guns N' Roses experience, "Lose Your Illusion" is "The Essential Guns N' Roses Live Tribute!"

See Video >

Hall and Oates

Hall and Oates are one of the most successful duos in music history, with hits like “You Make My Dreams”, “Maneater”, and “I Can’t Go For That”.

The Tribute BANDs FOR Hall and Oates

Private Eyes

Private Eyes, a Tribute to Daryl Hall & John Oates, delivers the timeless music from the best-selling duo of all time with a craftsman’s precision, as well as aiming for the visual blend of their classic late 70’s to early 80’s image. This Los Angeles-based band features note-for-note renditions of all the greatest hits, as well as some choice fan favorites.

See Video >

Heart

Heart opened the doors to the kingdom of rock for all female rock music artists to follow and left a legacy of great music in the process.

The Tribute BANDS FOR heart

DOG N BUTTERLY

Created in late 2003, DOG ‘N’ BUTTERFLY is a 5 piece band of accomplished musicians dedicated to bringing their talent and love of Heart’s memorable music of the 70’s and 80’s to the stage with unequaled accuracy and musical skill. Complete with stage show & retro- inspired costumes, Dog ‘N’ Butterfly takes the concept of “Tribute” to a whole new level!

See Video >

Huey Lewis and the News

Huey Lewis and the News brought an infectious blend of rock, pop, blues, and soul to the nation with unforgettable hits like “The Power of Love”, “Hip to Be Square”, and more!

The Tribute BANDs FOR Huey Lewis and the News

Hip To Be Square

In a concert experience that honors Huey Lewis and the News’ legacy, Hip To Be Square’s set list includes "deep cut" hardcore fan-favorites as well as renowned acappella and doo-wop songs. Hip To Be Square recreates all the sounds and energy of the original act with blazing saxophone and gorgeous harmonies.

See Video >

Heart of Rock n Roll

The Heart of Rock & Roll (THoRR, for short) is a top tier show band that goes beyond mere tribute with a Las Vegas level frontman who brings to life the look and sound of Huey Lewis so accurately, he’s fooled more than a few fans. It’s a non-stop multimedia ride through some of the biggest hits of the 80s and 90s in a colorful and exciting show complete with video elements, costume changes and fun audience interaction.

See Video >

The Tribute BANDS FOR Iron Maiden

Iron Maidens

Formed in 2001, The Iron Maidens have quickly established themselves as one of southern California’s most popular tribute acts and are rapidly gaining international recognition. The band boasts beauty as well as excellent musicianship, lively stage presence, and a remarkable stage show with theatrical scenes interspersed throughout.

See Video >

Maiden United

This Iron Maiden tribute band is a must-see for all heavy metal fans and lovers of great music everywhere. Having grown up listening to Iron Maiden and studying the band's music, clothing, and performance styles, Maiden United is the closest thing to having the actual members of Iron Maiden perform at your event.

See Video >

The Tribute BANDs FOR Jenni Rivera

Joyas Prestadas

Jenni Rivera Tribute celebrates the music legacy of La Diva. Featuring multi-awarded singer Mari Nobre (La Madrina), the Latin all stars band has been featured on TV shows like "ABC News" and "On the Red Carpet”.

See Video >

The Tribute BANDs FOR Jimmy Buffett

Mark Wood and the Parrot Head Band

Mark Wood and the Parrot Head Band perform a mixture of Calypso, Reggae, Rock and Roll, Country, R&B and Samba/Salsa all true to the partying Jimmy Buffett style. Just imagine this: Mark Wood and the Parrot Head Band along with Tiki Huts, Hawaiian Shirts, plenty of "Boat Drinks" and you instantly have a truly festive, contagious party atmosphere, that your guests will not soon forget.

See Video >

The Tribute BANDS FOR Journey

Journey USA

Journey USA is the closest thing to ‘70s & ‘80s Journey music you’ll ever hear! This jam-packed Journey tribute band captures the signature sound of the supergroup with hits like Don’t Stop Believing, Open Arms, Separate Ways, and Any Way You Want It — every song executed with stunning precision!

See Video >

Classic Journey

Undeniably the most exciting Journey Tribute act in Southern California, CLASSIC JOURNEY reenacts memories from the most influential era of our times. Featuring the legendary Franky Dee on lead vocals, and backed up by musicians that pay unique attention to every detail, they guarantee a unique concert and party experience with the iconic anthems and ballads that marked our youth.

See Video >

Joe Cocker

Joe Cocker was known for his dynamic stage performances and his gritty, bluesy vocal style.

The Tribute BANDs FOR Joe Cocker

Mad Dogs & The Englishman

Mad Dogs & The Englishman is an all-star band fronted by singer Jason Feddy, paying tribute to the legendary Joe Cocker. This band is composed of an incredible gathering of touring and recording musicians that will blow you away on stage, truly making this an all-star band that you won’t want to miss.

See Video >

Judas Priest

Judas Priest are an English heavy metal band formed in Birmingham in 1969. They have sold over 50 million copies of their albums, and are frequently ranked as one of the greatest metal bands of all time.

The Tribute BANDs FOR Judas Priest

Just Like Priest

Just Like Priest has been paying tribute to the Metal Gods, Judas Priest, for over a decade. They have evolved into one of the most visually and musically authentic tribute bands with props such as illumined Judas Priest logos, flags, a mini-Harley Davidson and costume changes throughout their show.

See Video >

KC and the Sunshine Band

KC and the Sunshine Band is an American disco and funk band which was founded in 1973 in Hialeah, Florida.

The Tribute BANDs FOR KC and the Sunshine Band

The Sunshine Experience

Stevie Bensusen as KC Stevie brings a wealth of experience to the Weekend Dance Explosion having done over a thousand shows. With Stevie’s soulful vocal interpretation, he takes KC to the next level and works the audience like no other!

See Video >

KISS
